ERROR_MESSAGE.DEFAULT: Something went wrong. Please call our customer care for support.
ERROR_MESSAGE.WRONG_TIER: You are not eligible to open an account. Please call our customer care for support.
ERROR_MESSAGE.EXISTING_CUSTOMER: You are already an existing customer. Please open an additional account.
ERROR_MESSAGE.OTP_SENT: OTP has been sent to your phone number. Please check your phone and enter the OTP.
ERROR_MESSAGE.OTP_FAILURE: OTP could not be sent. Please call our customer care for support or check that you entered the correct phone number.
ERROR_MESSAGE.FEEDBACK_SUCCESS: Feedback submitted successfully. Thank you for your feedback.
ERROR_MESSAGE.FEEDBACK_FAILURE: Feedback could not be submitted. Please call our customer care for support.
